ModMetaData.name: Lazy Stockpiles
ModMetaData.author: SuperCorgi
ModMetaData.description:
Adds Lazy Stockpiles. These stockpiles have a setting for "laziness".
Normal - Stockpile acts as a default stockpiles Cache - Stockpile will mitigate number of haul jobs to it. By default, will not merge stacks at 33% or greater. Buffer - Stockpile will mitigate number of haul jobs from it. By default, will kick out stacks at 75% or greater.
These options are configurable in the Mod Settings.
